inn1.comm: Drama straightaway. Gayle shoulders to a delivery that comes in with the angle to rap him on the pads.  Slips go up in appeal but Gayle was outside the off stump. And there was little puff of dust where the ball landed. And this is just the first ball.
beaten. That one landed on a length on the off stump and left Gayle. Vaas is right on the money here.
length delivery on the off stump, pushed to the off side
That one didn't bounce much. sailed harmless outside the off stump.

Vaas strikes early. Gayle is drawn into a fatal push outside offstump and Kumar Sangakkara swooped low to his left to pick up the catch. Gayle tarried briefly to get the confirmation from the umpires that it did carry cleanly before walking off.  It landed just short of a driveable length around the off stump and bent away a bit.

Sarwan survives a huge shout for lbw.  It pitched on a length on the leg and middle and veered towards the leg stump. Sarwan went back, rather than forward, and his bat came down in a angle but the ball was going down leg. Only just.
Similar delivery, similar shot but luckily, for Sarwan, there is a inside-edge this time.
Fidel Edwards starts off with a no ball.
Now a wide. A chance for West Indies to breathe after that torrid first over.
pushed to mid-off. Edwards is slowly getting his radar right. From outside leg to around off stump.
this one was on the middle, worked to the on side.
Chanderpaul gets off the mark with a flicked-four past square-leg. Fullvand on the legs.
Malinga again drifts on the legs and Chanderpaul flicks it behind square again. Easy pickings.
fullish and outside off, Chanderpaul goes for a drive, but too much bottom-hand and the bat handle rotates in his hand. The ball rolls towards mid-on
Finally the over ends after a series of no-balls and a wide. This one, full and on the off stump, is pushed away to cover

Got him! Vaas threatened to do this off the last two balls of the previous over but gets his man this time. He shifted his line towards the middle and that did the trick. It landed on a length and bent back in and Sarwan was caught at his crease. Feet went no where and now they will take him to the hutch.
Hmm... quite similar ball, again curves away after pitching on a length, Lara leans forward and gets his bat around his front pad to push it to the on side.
curving away outside off, left alone
That exaggerated forward defense by Lara. He leans forward to a delivery outside off and makes every effort to get behind the line, head over the ball to dead bat it away
Nice little outswinger that draws Lara further away from where he wanted to be when he went for a drive. Lara adjusts by taking one hand off the bat-handle and drives it towards point
And again. This time Lara tries to go through with his square drive but gets a inside edge.

And now Malinga strikes. After a wayward first over he produces a peach to remove Chanderpaul. A length-delivery around the off stump draws Chanderpaul towards the ball but it left him at the last minute and took a bit of outside edge enroute to Sangakkara. West Indies are reeling here. They won the toss, but so far its all Sri Lanka.
That one teased the outside edge. Almost another wicket. Full and slanting away, Hinds has a tentative poke at it.
Hinds is hurried on that occasion. Shapes to play a forward defensive stroke but was almost beaten by the pace.
Slanted outside off and left alone
Hinds is away with a square-slash to a fullish delivery outside off and the point fielder makes a half-stop.

Went for the dream outswinger, the one that swings from middle and leg.  To his credit Hinds didn't look to play it to the on side, chose to wait for the swing and albeit a bit ungainly, pushed it to off side
Vaas goes for the one that comes in, but ends up dragging it down the leg
almost gets his radar right this time. Again it comes in and Hinds falls over a bit in his attempt to flick it and is rapped on the pads. But it was going down leg.
leans forward to a fullish delivery on the off to push it away to the off side.
stretches outside off to reach a outswinger and pushes it towards point
well outside the off stump, moves further away, and Hinds lets it go through to Sangakkara
And again.
Lara goes for a off drive off the first ball that he recieves from Malinga. But is bit late in deciding to use that option and has to stretch forward in the end. The ball rolls to mid-off
Lara gets squared up this time as the ball landed on the stumps and veered away a bit. But he manages to keep it out.
swing and a miss! Again, Lara is bit late in moving towards the ball and doesn't quite manage to cover the line.
outside the off stump, Lara lets it sail through to the 'keeper
length delivery outside off and Lara moves quickly across to dead-bat it away.
on the hips, tucked away behind square-leg
Change of pace. around 118kmph . Delivered like a off break, it broke back in from outside off to beat an prod.  Raps him high on the pads.
A length delivery on the off and middle, pushed back to the bowler.
pushes a length delivery outside off to the off side.
beaten. Again in that channel outside off and Hinds ends up pushing inside the line
on the legs, worked to fine-leg.
delivered from that round-arm action of his. On the middle stump, pushed away towards cover.
this one curved the other way. Leaves the left-hand batsman and Hinds is beaten pushing down the wrong line
throws his bat to a delivery outside off, gets a outside edge that takes the ball past backward point
Lara caresses a length delivery outside offstump through cover point region. He made it look easy.
Hinds lets that sail harmlessly in the channel outside the off stump
leans forward to a length delivery outside off to push it away to cover
outside the off stump, inviting a fatal drive but Hinds resists.
another slow one, around 113 kmph, Hinds pushes forward, waits for the offbreak to come in before he steers it behind backward point
full and outside off stump, driven to mid-off

lovely length delivery outside off stump. i use that adjective as it appeared to be a replica of the previous one when he let it go. But this time he had dragged back the length and Lara adjusted well to play it quietly to the off side.
outside off and Lara refuses to do anything with it.
on a driveable length around the off and middle, driven to cover
Much fuller and on the off stump, Hinds thrust his front foot out to drive it past cover.
Again he attempts to force it through the off side ring. It was just outside off stump, and Hinds throws his bat at it but can't beat point
Yorker that almost squeezed under the bat. Hinds gets his bat down in time and the inside-edge takes the ball to fine-leg
another attempted yorker, right up there, pushed towards mid-off and they run with the stroke. Not much power behind that stroke and hence Lara took for a single
sliding down leg, Lara attempts to glance it but doesn't get a touch. It runs off the thigh pad
full and on the middle, Lara presents the full face of the bat while driving and it rolls straight back down the track
outside off, Lara covers the stumps and lets it go through to the 'keeper
Lara thrusts his right foot out to drive a fullish ball outside off to cover

Huge shout for a lbw decision. That one was close. It came in from outside off and Lara falls over a bit, his bat comes down in an angle and is rapped on the stumps. It would have taken out the middle. Hawk eye confirms. Plus no inside edge as well. Lucky break for Lara. Lara did the smart thing by fleeing the crime scene as quickly as possible! He shuffled his feet quickly to outside the off stump, and that must have thrown some doubt in the umpire (Asad Rauf)'s mind
Almost at the block hole, delivered from round the stumps. hinds jabs it down to thirdman
short of length delivery outside off and doesn't bounce as it sails outside the off stump. Fernando had hit the deck but couldn't extract much from this track.
beaten. Hinds pushes at a one outside off
stays back this time to dead-bat a length delivery
banged in short but again it doesn't climb as the bowler expected.  Easily pushed away towards point

Another appeal for lbw against Lara. It just pitched on the leg stump line and went straight on and Lara ends up playing outside the line and is hit in front of leg stump. Perhaps, the umpire thought it pitched outside the line. The tracker shows it landed just inside. Tough call.
Lara gets off to the other end.
Hinds gets him back on strike with a push down to thirdman
full and outside off, driven to cover
Lara goes for a drive but the ball stops on him and he gets an inside edge that takes the ball to square-leg. The ball is stopping on this sluggish track, not really ideal for strokemaking.
Much fuller and he drives but straight to cover.
comes in from outside off, Hinds pushes at it, away from his body, and inside-edges it on to his pads
Slower one. Loops in full and Hinds is caught by surprise but goes through with his shot and that saves him. It pops over the infield.
finally some bounce. Kicked up a bit off a length, Hinds is surprised but takes his bottom-hand out of the bat-handle and jabs it down in front of him.
fuller and driven to mid-off
Overpitched outside off and Hinds puts it away with ease. Square drives it past point.
banged in short, outside off, and Hinds drops his wrists, and lets it go through to the 'keeper
Maharoof tries to trap Lara again with the one that straightens but this time Lara makes contact.
shifts his line and alters the length. Full and on the off and middle, driven powerfully to mid-off
just short of length on the off,  Lara cuts but can't beat point
Again the slowness of this pitch beats an intended stroke. Lara went for a drive through the off side ring but it stops on him and the inside edge takes it past square-leg

Lara is out. After negating two close shouts Asad Rauf uphelds this one. It landed on a length on the middle and straightened. Lara shaped up to cut and is cramped. Tries desperately to bring his bat in front of his pad but it thuds into his front pad. Would have hit the top of the middle. West Indies are bleeding here.
pitches wide outside off stump and holds its line, Bravo lets it go through to the wicketkeeper
full and angling into middle stump from round the wicket, played back past the bowler on the off side
attempts the big drive and the edge flies wide off the first slip for four
short of  a length on off stump, Hinds goes back and punches to cover
fuller in length and homing in on Hinds' pads, flicked to midwicket
same angle from round the wicket but it's not as full, Hinds plays back and gets hit on the pad
fullish length and slanting into middle and leg, hinds plays forward and gets hit on the pad, Fernando thinks it's good for a shout but that was slipping down leg side
in the channel outside off stump, defended to point with an open face

and another wicket falls, Bravo overbalanced while trying to play the flick and the ball hit him plumb in front on the back leg. That ball pitched on a good length and Bravo was far too early on the shot
Maharoof pushes it outside off and Samuels covers the stumps and shoulders arms
Samules falls over a bit while trying to work a length delivery on the leg and middle and is hit on the pads.
leans forward to a delivery on the stump and pushes it to the on side
on the leg and middle. punched to the on side
attempted yorker, dug out back to the bowler
fullish on the off stump, Hinds pushes it at the last minute. Not much of a back-lift and he seems to decide at the last minute whether to go for a drive.
pushed to cover.
Again Fernando pings the yorker length, driven, without any back-lift, to cover
banged in short and Hinds gets into  a tangle as he takes his eyes off it. Manages to fend it away to square-leg and they rush across for a quick single.
slanted across Hinds who lets it go through to the 'keeper
Hinds had no clue about that slower one. It almost turned in from just outside off, and Hinds just got his bat away and thrusted his pad out. Hit outside the line.
full and outside off and a flat footed drive to cover results
sails harmlessly through outside the off stump.
the sluggish wicket comes into play to trouble the batsman. It stopped after landing on a length outside off and Hinds gets into a tangle as he is through with his shot even before the ball arrives.
driven to mid-off
beaten outside off.  Samuels goes for a drive ....
leans forward to push at a length delivery outside off.
banged in short but it doesn't climb up on this sluggish track, easily pushed away
short of length delivery outside off, not much bounce nor pace again, pushed to point.
Samuels is bit early into his drive, blame the pitch man. the ball rolls towards mid-on
Fernando tries to beat the conditions but fails! He bangs it in real short but it just sits up for Hinds to wave it away without any fuss.
West Indian innings is in shambles here as Samuels falls. His feet went back, his bat moved in front, away from his body, and Maharoof extracts a inside edge that disturbs the furniture.
He gets behind the line to dead-bat it away
That Smith riddle is answered. He perishes driving. Not a shot on this sluggish track. Quite a poor shot selection. Just popped up a simple catch to mid-on.
full and on the off, Baugh leans forward to defend
outside the off stump, left alone
on the middle stump, turning away, pushed to the off side
tossed up on the off stump, pushed to point
rips one on the middle and off and Hinds gets it on the pads as he pushes forward in defense.
on the legs, tucked behind square-leg. That s the first run in 10 balls.
rips one across that spins past across Baugh. Sangakkara collects it.
length delivery on the off stump, and Hinds punches it to sweeper cover
inswinger. Baugh almost gets his front foot too much across but just about manages to hold his balance and gets the bat in front of pad.
on the off stump, pushed to off side
again hint of in swing, pushed to the off side.
this one holds its line and Baugh pushes it towards point
slow leg cutter and Baugh is comprehensively beaten.
beaten outside off as he tries to drive with the spin
stretches forward to push a fullish delivery to the off side
floated it well outside the off stump, left alone&
goes back to a offbreak that landed on the leg stump and pushes it to left of point  and rushes across for a quick single
Baugh leans across to a tossed up delivery outside off and squaredrives it past point
doosra on the off stump but it was too short  and Hinds mistimed his pull shot and it rolled to left of mid-on
square-drives a fullish delivery to sweeper cover
another one that stops on the batsman. Baugh shapes for a cut and is made to wait an eternity before he could make contact. The ball rolls towards point
slow leg cutter but this time Baugh sees it at the last minute and with draws his bat
After that slow leg cutter, Maharoof gets one dart back in off the seam and catches Baugh in front. This is his first five-wicket haul in ODIs.  5 for 9! What a day for him.
What a drama. A peach of a yorker cleans up Edwards but hold on Maharoof,  Asad Rauf had no-balled him
Edwards throws his bat at a fullish delivery outside offstump, gets a outside edge that takes the ball to thirdman
tossed up on middle stump Hinds gets forward and defends
defended on the front foot on the off side
slower through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot&
pushed through flatter this time, Hinds gets forward again and blocks it
a touch straighter in line and Hinds plays the slog-sweep down to deep midwicket
Edwards survives. Tossed up, pitches outside off stump and spins in to Edwards who pushes forward and keeps it out
another no-ball, this has been one drawback in Sri Lanka's performance today, extras apart they have been lethal
full on middle stump, Hinds whips it off his pads but refuses the single
full again but straighter in line, Hinds drives down the ground but refuses to run a single again
slower ball outside off stump, Hinds opens the face and tries to run it to third man but misses
driven to mid-on, the single is refused  yet again

and Maharoof has his sixth wicket. Hinds was trying to protect Edwards and so when he saw a low full toos coming his way he tried to hit it over the infield, but the ball hit the splice of the bat and lobbed towards cover where Jayasuriya took a low catch diving forward
short of a length on off stump, defended on the off side
slips down leg side and takes the pad for a leg bye
tossed up on middle stump, takes the edge to short fine leg
played to mid-on for one
slow through the air outside off stump, defended on the back foot
fuller in length and Edwards slogs in over midwicket, the ball seems headed for the fence but Fernando runs across and makes an excellent save with one hand
good length, pitching outside off and heading towards middle, Collymore somehow manages to get his bat in the way and the ball takes the outside edge down to third man
a yorker this time, and swinging into the stumps, Edwards digs it out to mid-off for a sharp single
this time it's a touch wider, trying to bring the slips into play, the batsman lets it go
a slow legcutter angled on the pads, pushed awkwardly to midwicket
another yorker, the batsman somehow managed to get a bit ot bat on it and the ball trickles to square leg
a slower ball to finish off a teasing over, played on the off side
pitches just outside off and spins in a little, defended on the back foot&
the doosra and it turned a quite a lot away from the batsman who had little clue what was going on
the offspinner this time, played to short third man

that could have been the end  of the innings but Murali could not hang on to the return catch. It was fuller and the batsman tried to heave it over the bowler, he didn't get enough elevation and Murali managed to stretch and get his right hand to it
this time the heave comes off, on middle stump and Collymore slogged it to the midwicket fence
Murali replies with the doosra, Collymore played back to it and was beaten
starts off with a bouncer
the inswinging yorker at rapid pace, the batsman backs away outside leg stump and the ball crashes into his pads and rolls to slip
shorter in length and Edwards defends it was a straight bat past the bowler
and that's that, the inswinging yorker finished the job. It was full and fast and Edwards had no defence to it, the ball crashes into the stumps and West Indies are all out

inn2.comm: Tharanga goes first ball! Full outside off stump and Tharanga played a nothing shot really. He didn't move his feet at all and just chopped down half-heartedly at it, the ball took the bottom edge and crashed into his stumps
no-ball, it was full and angling into the pads, Jayawardene works it through midwicket
short of a length, angling into the pads, Jayawardene goes back, gets across and glances it delicately to the fine-leg fence
defended on the leg side
full length on off stump, no swing on that occasion, Jayawardene gets in line and blocks it
shorter in length on off stump, Jayawardene goes back and defends back to the bowler
fullish on off stump, driven to mid-off
short of a length and Jayawardene gets on his toes to defend it on the leg side
a touch slower outside off stump, Jayawardene waits for it and opens the face to run it down to third man
a loud appeal for leg before is turned down. That pitched a fraction outside leg stump and hit Jayasuriya, who played forward, in line with the stumps
defended on the leg side

Jayasuriya gets off the mark with a lucky boundary, the ball wasn't short enough or wide enough to cut but Jayasuriya tried to do precisely that and got a bottom edge past his stumps and to the fine-leg fence
straighter ball on the pads, worked off his hips behind square
good length on middle and angling across Jayasuriya who gets forward and defends. Edwards is bowling around 76 mph at the moment
full toss outside off stump, driven straight to cover
poor delivery, a half volley outside off stump and Jayasuriya creams it through cover for four

fullish outside off and Jayasuriya smashes it in the air towards Bravo at cover. It would have been a stunning catch for Bravo dived to his right at full stretch, the ball was racing towards him and he could only get a hand to it, saved a certain four though
tried to pull but was early on the shot, hit high on the thigh
driven to mid-off on the front foot
full on off stump, defended on the off side
good length and outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to cut but plays outside the line of the ball and gets beaten
straighter ball on of stump, this time Jayasuriya gets his bat close to the pad and defends on the front foot
Jayasuriya gets another streaky boundary, that pitcheed on off and middle and angled across Jayasuriya who was drawn into playing forward, the ball took the outside edge and flew wide off first slip
left alone outside off stump
straighter ball, Jayasuriya defends on the leg side
fullish length on off and middle, played back to the bowler
short of a length outside off stump, defended comfortably off the back foot towards cover
no-ball, full with a hint of swing into the pads, played to midwicket. West Indies can't afford these extras
short of a length outside off stump, that stopped on the batsman a little but Jayawardene let the ball come to him and defends it on the off side&
a touch short of a length, on off stump, defended on the back foot
played on the back foot to point
attempted yorker, swinging into Jayawardene and raps him on the pad, was missing leg stump
short of a length on off stump, no room to work with whatsoever, defended back to the bowler
this time there's room offered outside off stump and Jayasuriya cuts hard to the point fence
straighter line, on middle and leg, worked off the pads behind square
short of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene gets behind the line and defends with a full face on the back foot
beats the outside edge, that pitched short of a length and drew Jayawardene forward, there was a hint of away movement and the ball beats the outside edge of the batsman's forward defense
defended on the off side
dead straight on middle stump, Jayasuriya gets half forward and defends towards mid-off
slips down leg side, that's easily worked off the pads down to fine leg
good length outside off stump, Jayawardene again gets into line and defends confidently to cover
fuller length on off stump, Jayawardene tries to drive, went a little too hard at it and the ball flies to third man off the outside edge
short and wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya cuts it into the ground for a single to third man
pitches on a good length outside off stump and shapes away from Jayasuriya who lets it go
pitches outside leg stump, Jayasuriya gets forward far too early and gets hit on the knee roll
fullish length, pitches just outside leg and angles towards middle, Jayasuriya gets into line and blocks
defended on the front foot on the off side
angles across Jayasuriya who dabs it to point for a sharp single
short of a length outside off stump, defended on the back foot on the off side
short of a length on off stump, Jayasuriya goes back to defend but gets a thick outside edge towards point
in the channel outside off stump, Jayawardene plays back and defends
a touch straighter this time, angling into middle and leg, defended to midwicket
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
short ball, it hardly bounces, Jayawardene waits for it, swivels, and pulls it over square leg
this time it's his favoured inside-out shot over covers, Jayawardene stepped down, made room and lofted it over the in-field, he didn't time it perfectly but it was good enough to reach the fence
defended on the off side
loud appeal for leg before but the umpire says no, that pitched outside leg and hit Jayasuriya on the knee roll
middle and leg stump line, pulled to fine leg
short of a length, pitches outside off stump and angles away from Jayawardene who lets it go
angling into the batsman from outside off stump, defended on the front foot
Jayawardene charges down the track again, looking for the inside-out shot over cover, this time he gets a thick edge down to third man for four
short of a length outside off stump, Jayasuriya tries to force it through the off side but doesn't time it well
another no-ball, played to midwicket
banged in short this time, Jayasuriya tries to pull but was very early on the shot and doesn't make contact
sprayed wide outside off stump
banged in short again and this time Jayasuriya times the pull shot to perfection and sends the ball speeding to the fence
full toss outside off stump, driven through cover point
fuller length and a touch slower, Jayawardene gets forward and defends back past the bowler
full and on Jayawardene's legs, the batsman has no trouble in leaning across and flicking to the midwicket fence
big shout first up, that pitched way outside leg stump and hit him on the pad, not even close
beaten outside the off stump
quicker ball, defended back to the bowler
pushed through flatter, it's a touch short outside off stump as well, Jayasuriya steers it through point and the ball races to the fence
and again, it's far too short from Samuels, Jayasuriya threads the gap in the off-side field with precision and finds the fence again
he tries to cut again but doesn't make proper contact, the ball goes on the bounce to slip
full and straight, driven back to the bowler
whoops, Jayawardene was extremely early on the drive and stopped his shot, the ball lobs high in the air off a thick outside edge but falls just over cover
bang! Dropped short and Jayasuriya took advantage of the width and slapped it over mid-off for four
another bounary, you can't bowl short and wide to Jayasuriya unless you want to be cut for four
Jayasuriya tries to heave it out of the stadium but doesn't make contact
played to cover where Sarwan dives to save runs
and thats four of them, drifts down leg side and Jayawardene sweeps to the long-leg fence
Jayawardene turns it off his pads and down to the fine-leg fence for the winning runs
